name: Box Girl
description:
Operate the girl trapped in the cursed mansion and aim to escape.

The girl's special ability is to "get into the box and turn off the signs".

It seems she learned this by playing a certain stealth game.

However, I don't know if it's really useful ...

[Basic operation]

W, A, S, D keys: character movement

mouse: camera movement

E key: interaction

F key: light on / off

Left SHIFT Button: Execute

SPACE key: Enter the box

ESC key: Opens the pause menu
